### Project Description

The Government of Canada, represented by Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC), is soliciting a contractor for the management of a multi-purpose training facility and related services. This initiative is part of a comprehensive project led by the Department of National Defence (DND).

The training facility will be required to accommodate a variety of training scenarios at a single location, spanning from September 17 to October 7, 2022. The chosen contractor must provide:

* A minimum of 100 square kilometers of land in Canada or the US with 1500 feet elevation difference
* Facilities available 24 hours per day for training activities
	+ Live firing ranges
	+ Close Quarter Battle (CQB) and breaching
	+ Mobility and driver training
	+ Aviation operations
	+ High-altitude parachuting
	+ A paved runway/landing strip (7000 ft x 120 ft)
	+ Accommodations and logistics support

### Requirements

* Competitors must hold a valid Supply Arrangement (W3048-21KJ02) or meet qualification requirements to submit a proposal.
* Participants must provide a comprehensive plan detailing their ability to meet the needs outlined in the tender package.
* The chosen contractor will be required to provide a minimum of 100 square kilometers of land in Canada or the US.

### Submittal Instructions

The following is required for this tender:

* The request for Supply Arrangement (W3048-21KJ02) must be downloaded from Buy and Sell.
* Submissions must be made in one of Canada's official languages (English or French).

The government retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on all procurement matters and is not liable for any expenses associated with preparing a submittal. For any inquiries, please contact Herb Choquette (DC Thu Chaqueauxom) at herb.choquette@pwgsc-tpsgc.gc.ca. 613
